TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: Of note: water appears to temporarily neutralize the deadly matter as it is immersed by the waves that wash onto the island.
CASSAVA: The deadly matter has proven disturbingly capable of penetrating any space.. The only protection appears to be water, which completely neutralizes its advance.
CASSAVA: If this hypothesis is true... Is that how I was able to survive whatever happened?
CASSAVA: ..I must focus on my research. There is another property of this matter I have noticed that I must investigate further on <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth.</color>
